channel.title: Sound Mods Possible?
channel.description: Is it possible to mod a sound to either remove, change the sound, or adjust the volume? Specifically the Chainsaw. It would be nice to lower the volume or change it completely. It is way to loud and annoying.

item.title: Sound Mods Possible?
item.dc:creator: @JamieRCHI Jamie
item.description:
@JamieRCHI wrote:

Is it possible to mod a sound to either remove, change the sound, or adjust the volume?
Specifically the Chainsaw. It would be nice to lower the volume or change it completely. It is way to loud and annoying.

Read full topic
